References:

    https://www.npmjs.com/package/secure-spreadsheet
    https://www.npmjs.com/package/xlsx-populate
    https://www.npmjs.com/package/cfb
    https://www.npmjs.com/package/buffer

"node_small_file.bin" (based on an 0x1000 file size threshold for variations in
CFB output behaviour) generated by:

    let output = cfb.utils.cfb_new();
    cfb.utils.cfb_add(output, "hello.txt", Buffer.from("1234", "utf8"));
    output = cfb.write(output);

"node_large_file.bin" generated by:

    let text = "";
    for (var i = 0; i < 7491; i++) { text += "!"; }

    let output = cfb.utils.cfb_new();
    cfb.utils.cfb_add(output, "goodbye.txt", Buffer.from(text, "utf8"));
